entries.meaning: The head of a pin. (Frequently used in size comparisons.)
examples: The moment the nitre was red hot, the coal, previously reduced to small pieces of the size of a pinhead, was projected in portions of one or two grains at a time…
Synonyms: doofus, dumbbell, dunce; see also Thesaurus:idiot

entries.meaning: (slang, medicine) A human head that is unusually tapered or small, often due to microcephaly, or a person with that trait. Often promoted in freak shows as "human pinheads".
examples: The microcephalic idiot is an unfortunate with a "pinhead," sometimes exhibited as a "what's-it" in circus side-shows, whose mental age never goes beyond that of an imbecile.

entries.meaning: (slang, pet stores) A newborn cricket used as food for pets.
(mycoculture) The immature juvenile fruiting body of a mushroom prior to its gills opening.
